name: tm33
effect: Teaches Reflect to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Reflect to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Ice Punch)

flavor_text.sun_moon: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
